item.description:
Let's show HQ our support.

The regular Nashua Meetup group planning meeting will be at HQ at 6:30pm followed immediately with phone banking til 8:30pm. There'll be a Ron Paul authored book given away.
After phone bank and meeting we will join the debate watching party at the office.
come on out and enjoy this with us - and get some work done at the same time!!!

I'll tell a story about Rudy's bodyguards - don't you want to hear it?

Carpooling meetup at Nashua Borders. 5:30pm.

We welcome an optional donation, $10 or more (the group needs it for supplies).

Also, 2' x 3' yard signs will be available for sale. (these were bought by meetup members for distribution where needed and for our standouts and demonstrations)
item.name: Meeting - calling - and DEBATE WATCHING PARTY
